author: stsp
msg: On the 1.6.x-testsuite-apr-hash-order branch, merge the following revisions
from trunk: r1292255, r1292260, r1292296, and r1292322 (clean merge).
Allows the swig-py tests to run with APR 1.4.6

author: mbautin
msg: Every time we read response in HBaseClient we create instance of valueClass using reflection and Hadoop APIs. valueClass is set in a constructor of HBaseClient to one of parameters. The parameter is always HbaseObjectWritable.
We can remove reflection by hardcoding HbaseObjectWritable.
All 3 fails when run against trunk.
